articles.title: Sex sells: China farm region becomes 'lingerie capital' - and biggest order is from North Korea - The Star Online
articles.description: Americans like their lingerie to be risque, Europeans prefer it more classy, and Chinese remain a bit shy but are opening up. But the biggest order of all came from North Korea.
